DOC.brief_summary: According Section 7.3 Section 7.4 , ISO 15197 ( 2003 ) , adopts whole blood fingertip vein sample evaluate accuracy portable BGM .
DOC.detailed_description: The clinical medical technologist collect blood sample 308 volunteer include 87 diabetic 221 healthy people . The range blood glucose concentration 41.2mg/dL 521mg/dL . The result clinic evaluation show accuracy BGM match requirement ISO15197 ( 2003 ) .
